item_prototype.name: Card Type Slot ["{#SNMPINDEX}"]
item_prototype.description: Column Description: 260:EC2 724:EC2-X 16384:AC16 the other type could see the card type table

trigger_prototype.name: High Memory Consumption in the Slot {#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.expression:
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardCpuUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>=70
and
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardMemUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>=70
or
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardCpuUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=0
and
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardMemUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression:
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardCpuUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}<70
and
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardMemUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}<70
or
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardCpuUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>0
and
{Template OLT FiberHome:cardMemUtil.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Slot {#SNMPINDEX} possibly stuck
trigger_prototype.description: Card possivelmente travado, favor verificar no ANM/UNM o status do Card
